languages.text: "Опять тут до упора просижу, и мне бригадир уши оторвет. Но как уйти? Игра только пошла!"
"Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"
languages.original_text: "Опять тут до упора просижу, и мне бригадир уши оторвет. Но как уйти? Игра только пошла!"

traits.locale_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"
"Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"
"Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"
"Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"
"Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

languages.text: “啊，我敢说，要是让我坐下来，我恐怕又会玩上好久，工头估计要把我脑袋拧下来了。但我哪能走呢？这局棋才刚刚变得有意思起来！”
languages.original_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

traits.locale_text: “啊，我敢说，要是让我坐下来，我恐怕又会玩上好久，工头估计要把我脑袋拧下来了。但我哪能走呢？这局棋才刚刚变得有意思起来！”

languages.text: «Buf, ya sé que me voy a pasar aquí el día y que el capataz me va a cantar las cuarenta mil, pero ¿cómo voy a marcharme ahora? ¡Acabamos de llegar a la parte buena!».
languages.original_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

traits.locale_text: «Buf, ya sé que me voy a pasar aquí el día y que el capataz me va a cantar las cuarenta mil, pero ¿cómo voy a marcharme ahora? ¡Acabamos de llegar a la parte buena!».

languages.text: 「うう…またここでずっと遊んでいたら職長に殴られちまう。でも、帰れねえよ。ちょうど盛り上がってきたんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

traits.locale_text: 「うう…またここでずっと遊んでいたら職長に殴られちまう。でも、帰れねえよ。ちょうど盛り上がってきたんだ！」

languages.text: "Hm, ich wette, werde hier wieder ewig spielen, und der Vorarbeiter macht mich dann einen Kopf kürzer. Aber wie könnte ich gehen? Jetzt wird das Spiel doch erst gut!"
languages.original_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

traits.locale_text: "Hm, ich wette, werde hier wieder ewig spielen, und der Vorarbeiter macht mich dann einen Kopf kürzer. Aber wie könnte ich gehen? Jetzt wird das Spiel doch erst gut!"

languages.text: « Hmph, j'imagine que je vais encore rester là à jouer pendant des heures. C'est le contremaître qui va me faire ma fête... Mais je peux pas partir comme ça ! La partie devient tout juste intéressante ! »
languages.original_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

traits.locale_text: « Hmph, j'imagine que je vais encore rester là à jouer pendant des heures. C'est le contremaître qui va me faire ma fête... Mais je peux pas partir comme ça ! La partie devient tout juste intéressante ! »

languages.text: "Öf. Kesin yine saatlerce burada oturup oynarım, sonra ustabaşım da kellemi keser. Nasıl kalkayım şimdi? Tam oyunun güzel yerine gelmişiz!"
languages.original_text: "Ugh, I bet I'm gonna sit here playing for ages again, and the foreman will have my head for it. But how can I leave? The game's just getting good!"

traits.locale_text: "Öf, kesin yine saatlerce burada oturup oynarım, sonra ustabaşım da kellemi keser. Olsun, nasıl kalkayım şimdi? Daha yeni oyunun asıl güzel yerine geldik!"
